name: Untitled Ghost Game (RoyRosta)
description:
An puzzle adventure game where you can talk to objects and get into thier "inner world".

Plot: You are a ghost and there is a body in front of you right in a bathtub, that must be you when you're alive. So you set off to an advanture to find out what caused your death, but you are just so week that you can't even move anything in the real-world. Luckly, there are something else wonderful you can do.
